about_the_game:
This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon.

This hostess was chosen to join the fight from "Dream Club," a club for adults that can only be joined by those with a pure heart. The most aloof hostess at Dream Club, Mian appears to have reluctantly agreed to help defend the Earth. Always depending on others, for her Ability she sets down an automated laser turret, and for her SP Move she requests an explosive shooting star attack. For her weapon, she uses a devastating laser cannon that appeared in the EDF: IR world. The longer you fire it, the stronger it gets, and at maximum output it can deliver some ruinous results. Now, THIS is pure power.

Always depending on others, for her Ability she sets down an automated laser turret, and for her SP Move she requests an explosive shooting star attack. For her weapon, she uses a devastating laser cannon that appeared in the EDF: IR world. The longer you fire it, the stronger it gets, and at maximum output it can deliver some ruinous results. Now, THIS is pure power.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
  • Additional Notes: XInput Controller
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
